mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_books ( isbn, title, author, publisher, price, discount, description, pubdate, link, image ) VALUES ( #{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{price} ,#{discount}, #{description}, #{pubdate}, #{link}, #{image} )
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_books ( isbn VARCHAR2(13) PRIMARY KEY, title nVARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL , author nVARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL , publisher nVARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, price number , discount number , description nVARCHAR2(2000), pubdate VARCHAR2(10) , link VARCHAR2(125) , image VARCHAR2(125) )
